content.question: <math alttext="the indefinite integral of, the fraction with numerator 4 times x cubed, and denominator 2 x, plus 3, end fraction, d x, equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mo stretchy="true">∫</mo><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>ⅆ</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator x to the fourth power, and denominator x squared, plus, 3 x, end fraction, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></math>

<math alttext="x to the fourth power, times the natural log of, the absolute value of, 2 x, plus 3, end absolute value, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><mi>ln</mi><mrow><mo>|</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="two thirds times x cubed, minus, three halves times x squared, plus, nine halves x, minus, the fraction 27 over 4, end fraction, times the natural log of, the absolute value of, 2 x, plus 3, end absolute value, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>9</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>27</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="two thirds times x cubed, minus, three halves times x squared, plus, nine halves x, minus, the fraction 27 over 2, end fraction, times the natural log of, the absolute value of, 2 x, plus 3, end absolute value, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>9</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>27</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="two thirds times x cubed, minus, three halves times x squared, plus, nine halves x, minus, the fraction 27 over 4, end fraction, times the natural log of, the absolute value of, 2 x, plus 3, end absolute value, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>9</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>27</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 6.10: Integrating Functions Using Long Division and Completing the Square

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
